channel.title: Achievements on Vassili Alexopoulos
channel.description: Recent content in Achievements on Vassili Alexopoulos

item.title: Tau Beta Pi Member
item.description: Nominated to the Tau Beta Pi engineering honors society for having a GPA among the top 5% of my graduating class at Stanford.

item.title: PanHellenic Scholarship Awardee
item.description: Honors outstanding Greek-American students of high scholastic achievement. Received Summer 2024.

item.title: Stanford Existential Risks Initiative (SERI) Summer Fellow
item.description: Selected for SERI’s 2024 Summer Fellows program; focus on U.S.–China cooperation on emerging biotechnology.

item.title: Boothe Prize Nominee
item.description: Nominated for the Boothe Prize for outstanding expository and argumentative writing in first-year writing.

item.title: State Champion in Policy Debate
item.description: First place at the 2021 OSDA State Tournament (policy debate).

item.title: Tournament of Champions Qualifier
item.description: Qualified for the 2021 TOC, one of the most prestigious high-school debate tournaments in the U.S.
